div.p: This case-sensitive code system https://fhir.nhs.uk/England/CodeSystem/RA-ConditionCode defines the following codes:

tr.td: Vision (for example blindness or partial sight)
Hearing (for example deafness or partial hearing)
Mobility (for example walking short distances or climbing stairs)
Dexterity (for example lifting and carrying objects, using a keyboard)
Social or behavioural (for example associated with autism spectrum disorder (ASD) which includes Asperger’s, or attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD))
Patient would prefer not to say

description.value: A CodeSystem to identify the SNOMED-CT concept representing an Impairment recorded as part of a Reasonable Adjustment
